numericalresponse.label: What is the average time that a customer is in the system? (answer in mins)
numericalresponse.description: In orther words, the average waiting time in the queue + the service time. (Round to 3 decimal places.)

span.p: The average waiting time in the queue is given by \(W_{q} = \frac{L_{q}}{\lambda} = \frac{5}{12}\) (min)
